src/lib/components/DashGantt.react.js.description:
DashGantt is a React component that creates an interactive Gantt chart with support for
hierarchical data, timeline visualization, and both bar and line chart representations.
It supports horizontal scrolling for timeline data while maintaining a fixed left column
for job descriptions.

methods.name: updateCurrentTimePosition
methods.docblock:
Calculates and updates the position of the current time indicator
based on the currentTime prop
methods.description:
Calculates and updates the position of the current time indicator
based on the currentTime prop

methods.name: handleTimelineScroll
methods.docblock:
Handles horizontal scrolling of the timeline view
@param {Event} e - Scroll event
methods.description: Handles horizontal scrolling of the timeline view

methods.name: toggleRow
methods.docblock:
Toggles the expanded/collapsed state of a hierarchical row
@param {string|number} id - Unique identifier of the row
methods.description: Toggles the expanded/collapsed state of a hierarchical row

methods.name: renderJobTitle
methods.description: Renders a job title with appropriate indentation and controls

methods.name: renderHierarchicalData
methods.description: Recursively renders the hierarchical job list

methods.name: generateTimeIntervals
methods.docblock:
Generates time intervals for the timeline header
@returns {Array} Array of moment.js objects representing time intervals

returns.description: Array of moment.js objects representing time intervals

methods.description: Generates time intervals for the timeline header

methods.name: renderTimelineHeader
methods.docblock: Renders the timeline header with date/time intervals
methods.description: Renders the timeline header with date/time intervals

methods.name: renderBar
methods.description: Renders a bar representing a task in the timeline

methods.name: renderLineChart
methods.description: Renders a line chart for time series data

methods.name: renderCurrentTimeLine
methods.docblock: Renders the current time indicator line
methods.description: Renders the current time indicator line

methods.name: renderTimelineContent
methods.description: Renders all timeline content including bars and line charts

methods.name: calculatePosition
methods.description: Calculates the horizontal position percentage for a given date

methods.name: calculateWidth
methods.description: Calculates the width percentage for a task's duration

methods.name: getItemColor
methods.description: Gets the color for a task based on the colorMapping configuration

methods.name: generateTooltip
methods.description: Generates tooltip content for a task

id.description: Optional(str): The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

data.description: Optional(Dict[str, Any]): The data structure defining the Gantt chart. Hierarchical data is supported.

title.description: Optional(str): The title to display in the top left corner above the tasks window.

startDate.description: Required(str | dt.datetime): The very first date the timeline view will begin with.

endDate.description: Required(str | dt.datetime): The very last date the timeline view will end with.

currentTime.description: Optional(str | dt.datetime): The current time attribute defines where to display a vertical cutoff line.

timeScale.description:
Required(Dict[str, Any]): Configuration for the timeline scale and formatting.
unit: The time unit for intervals ('minutes', 'hours', 'days', 'weeks', 'months')
value: The number of units between each interval
format: The moment.js format string for displaying dates

columnWidth.description: Optional(number): Width in pixels for each column in the timeline view. Default is 100.

maxHeight.description: Optional(str | number): Maximum height of the component. Can be pixel value or CSS string. Default is '80vh'.

colorMapping.description:
Optional(Dict[str, Any]): Configuration for mapping data values to colors.
key: The field in data items to use for color mapping
map: Object mapping field values to color strings (e.g., {"completed": "green", "pending": "orange"})

tooltipFields.description: Optional(List[str]): List of field names from the data items to display in tooltips when hovering over bars.

lineGraphData.description:
Optional(Dict[str, Dict]): Data for rendering line charts instead of bars for specific tasks.
Object keys should match task IDs, values contain:
dates: Array of dates for the x-axis
values: Array of numbers (0-100) for the y-axis
color: Optional color string for the line

styles.description:
Optional(Dict[str, Any]): Custom styles for different parts of the component.
Available style objects:
container: Styles for the main container
header: Styles for the header section
jobs: Styles for the jobs column
timeline: Styles for the timeline section
taskBar: Styles for individual task bars
timeCell: Styles for timeline header cells
caretButton: Styles for expand/collapse buttons

className.description:
Optional(Dict[str, Any]): Custom CSS classes for different parts of the component.
Allows Dash developers to apply their own CSS classes
